entity1.name: Ancient Egypt
entity1.description: A civilization in northeastern Africa, known for its advanced culture and significant historical contributions.

entity2.name: Egyptians
entity2.description: The inhabitants of Egypt, particularly those from the ancient period who developed a complex society and culture.

entity3.name: afterlife

entity8.name: pharaohs

entity9.name: afterlife
entity9.description: The belief in a form of existence or consciousness that continues after the death of the physical body, particularly significant in ancient Egyptian culture.

entity10.name: pyramids

entity23.name: ancient Egyptians
